entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High 8 except plus 3 in onshore winds.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High 8 except plus 3 in onshore winds. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 04 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Wednesday 04 May 2016
